title: Hicuri
typeOfFood: Vegan, Italian, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Spanish
description: Long established vegetarian restaurant and bar, switched to vegan in 2013, and added a shop in 2014. Offers natural juices and smoothies, roasted veggies, and house specialty lasagna. Options without gluten, sugar, soy. Artistic space. Closes last Sunday of the month.
streetAddress: Calle Santa Escolastica, Esquina Plaza Girones 4
